ModMetaData.name: LMC042.摇钱树
ModMetaData.author: HeroShadow
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Who said that money doesn't grow on trees? 是谁说钱不能长在树上的？ This mod isn't to be taken seriously, but I am willing to take suggestions if there are any. 这个mod不需要认真对待，但是如果有任何建议，我愿意接受。 汉化：jxb12306 合集地址：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html
